group_1.narration: Allow me to explain Asuka's@idea in more detail...
Basically, I would be giving support@and protection on request.
That's what she thinks@I should do, anyway.
...Well it may sound like she's just taking@advantage of me, but I like the idea.
Because... That's right, we also@had a conversation like this.

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it lonely being a Magical Girl?
We fight Witches and save lives,@but nobody ever knows what we did...
I'm not sure how to say@it...but it's just so painful...

group_1.narration: I never thought I would ever talk@to anyone about these thoughts.@I was so embarrassed by them.
But for some reason, I felt@like I could be honest with Asuka.

group_1.textRight: Lonely...@I guess we are alone a lot of the time.
But when I became a Magical Girl...@I made a vow.
Defeat the Witches who sew chaos@in our world, and protect people.
I focus completely on that while I fight.

group_1.narration: Asuka is so focused!@She doesn't overthink things.
What was I so hung up about, anyway?@I guess I had forgotten...
The [textRed:knight] in my picture book@only focused on saving people.

group_1.textLeft: All right, that's it!@No more thinking for me!

group_1.textRight: No, no, no!@You can't just go around not thinking!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah I can!@I feel so good right now!

group_1.narration: And so, I agreed to be Asuka's support.
...I don't exactly know any other@Magical Girls to help, after all.
But!@If they call for me, I'll come running.

group_1.textRight: I'm going to engage the enemy!

group_1.textLeft: Go for it!@I've got this covered!

group_1.textCenter: An attacker and a defender...@We make a good team, I think!
